description: Instructions, ideas, and suggested schedules for singing time in Primary, and the annual Children’s Sacrament Meeting Presentation. Music should help children feel the love of Heavenly Father, learn the gospel of Jesus Christ, and feel the Spirit.
content:
Music for Singing Time 2021
Find a suggested singing time music list for 2021.
Instructions for Singing Time
View singing time instructions and resources.
Children’s Sacrament Meeting Presentation
See guidelines for this annual presentation.
Teaching Tips for Singing Time
View ideas, tips, and resources for singing time.
Primary Music Collections
Music is an excellent way to help children recognize the Spirit of the Lord. The Children’s Songbook, Friend magazine, and Hymns include wonderful songs that are fun and engaging.
